4.1 PNG Signature.Description: The PNG Signature constitutes the first eight bytes of every PNG file

4.1.1.Action: The first eight bytes are equivalent to: 0x89, 0x50 (‘P’), 0x43 (‘N’), 0x47 (‘G’), 0x0d, 0x0a, 0x1a, and 0x0a.

4.1.2.Action: Files that do not conform to the specification requirements.
